title: Covid-19 Tracker
description: A covid 19 tracker developed using React. This web application provides overall status for global countries and some details for India. Developed in the early stage of the pandemic (2020).

title: To Do - App
description: This is a basic todo app. In this app I used redux for state management. I have coverd basic functionalities. But we can do lot more with this app. I have mentioned few points. Please feel free to add any usefull funcationalities into this project.

title: Country Details App
description: An application to get the details of all the countries.

title: Country Details App
description: An application to get the details of all the countries.
